Text: I could not get the subs to play along with the movie.  Tried several things that would normally work for VLC.  Could it have anything to do with the ".idx" ext that was on the file?  Thx.

The subs are incomplete. Any idx must be accompanied by a sub file. The idx is just a time stamp to file pointer and the sub has the actual bitmaps that make up the subtitle.

Thank you, TvTeam! F'ing lamers. Either post shit properly or don't post at all!
Anyone know where I can find decent English subtitles for this?
use opensubtitles site to find them... never use those that come with movie and thanks TvTeam for it being subbed not dubbed.

@Elite49
13 assasins has no subs at opensubtitles
